Module com.example.miniproject2
Package com.example.miniproject2.controller

Interface IFields

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameController
public interface IFields
The IFields interface defines the methods required for managing text fields in the Sudoku application. Implementing classes should provide functionality for creating text fields, inserting numbers, and validating input.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createTextFields()
    Creates the text fields for the Sudoku grid.
    void
    insertNumberIntoActiveTextField(int number)
    Inserts a number into the currently active text field.
    void
    validateAndColorFields(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, int i, int j, int num, boolean isClue)
    Validates the input in a specified text field and applies color based on its correctness.

  • Method Details

    • createTextFields

      void createTextFields()
      Creates the text fields for the Sudoku grid. This method should initialize and configure the text fields as needed.

    • insertNumberIntoActiveTextField

      void insertNumberIntoActiveTextField(int number)
      Inserts a number into the currently active text field.
      Parameters:
      number - The number to be inserted into the active text field.

    • validateAndColorFields

      void validateAndColorFields(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, int i, int j, int num, boolean isClue)
      Validates the input in a specified text field and applies color based on its correctness. This method checks the number against the Sudoku rules and updates the visual representation accordingly.
      Parameters:
      textField - The text field to validate.
      i - The row index of the field in the Sudoku grid.
      j - The column index of the field in the Sudoku grid.
      num - The number to validate.
      isClue - Indicates whether the field is a clue (immutable).
